snippet: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rose above 1,400 for the first time in almost four years and is on pace for the best first quarter since 1998.
abstract: Stocks advance, sending the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index above 1,400 for the first time in almost four years; it rose 8.32 points, or 0.60 percent, to 1,402.60.
lead_paragraph: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rose above 1,400 for the first time in almost four years and is on pace for the best first quarter since 1998.

headline.seo: Shares Continue Surge as S.&P. Keeps Its Pace
headline.main: Shares Continue Surge as S.&P. Breaks 1,400
headline.print_headline: Shares Continue Surge As S.&P. Breaks 1,400
